summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Boston Street (South side), from Thorndyke Avenue to 26th Avenue West; by constructing concrete walks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7863 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
